ygData.msgSnippet: Ice:: As she woke up, the drones stopped moving and fell to the floor.  She got up and stretched and yawned. She walked over to the drones and looked at them.

Ice::

As she woke up, the drones stopped moving and fell to the floor.  She 
got up and stretched and yawned. She walked over to the drones and 
looked at them. "I wonder how they got over here?"  She send out the 
mental message to Veratis. "OK, I"m rested. What other tests do you 
want to do now?"
